title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 421 - Standards of Practice for Adoption Services
content:

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 22, 34, 101, 111-b, 111-i, 358-a, 372-b, 372-d, 372-e, 373-a, 374- a, 378-a, 378[a][2], [5], 383[3], 383-c, 384, 384-a, 384- b, 390, 398, 398-a, 398-b, 409-e, 409-f, 424-a, 450- 458, 460-d; Family Court Act, art. 10-A, § 1017; L. 1986, ch. 451; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 1999, ch. 7, §§ 7, 55, 58; L. 2000, ch. 145; L. 2006, ch. 668; L. 2008, ch. 623, § 5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
